field.label: Order Status for successful transactions
field.description: Select the order status to which the actual order is set, if the payment transaction was successful.

field.label: Capture Payment Status

field.description: To capture Payment Immediate.

field.name: refund

field.description: Refund Payment When Cancel or Return Order

field.name: payment_group
field.label: Group
field.description: To move the payment to a specified group. If not leave this field empty

field.name: epay_md5
field.label: MD5
field.description: The type of MD5 usage. 0 disables MD5. 1 uses MD5 on the accept page on this shop. 2 creates a MD5 stamp, which is send to ePay with transaction data. If this stamp does not match ePay will decline the payment.
field.option: MD5 on both data transmitted to ePay and on accept page

field.name: epay_paymentkey
field.label: MD5 key
field.description: If MD5 is enabled above the secure key for MD5 stamping is defined here (same secret key must be defined in the ePay administration). If MD5 is disabled leave this field empty.

field.name: epay_authsms
field.label: Auth SMS
field.description: Enter a mobile number here to receive a SMS message when the payment is verified by ePay.

field.name: epay_authemail
field.label: Auth EMAIL
field.description: Enter one or more email addresses to receive an email when the payment is verified by ePay. For multiple receivers separate the email addresses by semicolon (;).

field.name: ownreceipt
field.label: Epay ownreceipt
field.option: Receipt in the standard pyment window

field.name: epay_3dsecure
field.label: 3D Secure
field.option: Only payments by use of 3D secure is allowed

field.name: activate_callback
field.label: Activate callback
field.description: Callback is used to avoid missing update of the shopping system if the user closes the browser before redirect to the shop from ePay is made.(It is recommended that callback is enabled to update the shop even if the customer during the payment process closes the browser)

field.name: transaction_fee
field.label: Transaction Fee
field.description: Often it is necessary to present the transaction fee to the customer ePay will calculate the fee and put it on the payment before the payment is made
field.option: Customer does not pay the transaction fee
The customer pays the transaction fee

field.name: epay_subscription
field.label: Subscription
field.description: Subscriptions are used for creating payments that can be authorized more than once (recurrent payments)
field.option: All payments are created as recurrent subscriptions

field.name: epay_authemailcustomer
field.label: Auth EMAIL Customer
field.description: Enter one or more email addresses to receive an email when the payment is verified by ePay. For multiple receivers separate the email addresses by semicolon (;)
